column3:
ふふっ… ヴォーイからプレゼントとは
意外と嬉しいものだな…
ん…？
column4:
Hehehe... Getting a present from a voe
made me much happier than I thought it
would.
...Huh?

column3:
お お前まだいたのか！

お前には私のヴォーイが世話になったな

不甲斐ないヴォーイだが
ヴォーイとは ヴァーイが育てるものだと聞く
みっちり鍛えてやらんとな！

お前も早く私とそこのヴォーイのように
運命の人と出会えるといいな
column4:
Oh! You're still here!


I really owe you for helping out my voe.
It's true that he's more than a bit on the 
shy, nervous side...
That's nothing a little push in the right
direction can't solve, though!

I hope you get to meet your true love
soon, like I did!

column3:
ふふっ… ヴォーイからプレゼントとは
意外と嬉しいものだな…
雨でぬれんようにしないとな…

ん…？
column4:
Hehehe... Getting a present from a voe
made me much happier than I thought it
would.
I need to keep it from getting wet in
the rain.

...Huh?
